channel.title: Concepts on Velocitas
channel.description: Recent content in Concepts on Velocitas

item.title: Logging guidelines
item.description: Rationale: Logging application behavior is absolutely necessary for monitoring applications and also track down possible issues. Levels In Velocitas, we establish the following log levels, ordered from lowest to highest priority: Level Purpose Examples Debug Display of information to aid debugging of live systems like resolved values, executed lines of code, taken branches etc… "variable=5", "executing branch debug==false" Info Display of regular, user friendly messages to indicate the current state of the application.
